DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine infusion local anesthetic ropivacaine ( numbing medicine ) non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug ketorolac ( pain killer similar ibuprofen ) catheter place along cesarean delivery incision , reduce pain experienced cesarean section need narcotic pain medicine .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Local Anesthetic Wound Infiltration Postoperative Pain Following Cesarean Delivery
